rules_text:
Double strike
Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
{3}{R}{R}, Exile Fiora, Reckless Companion from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 3/3 and is a Machina artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.
